text: Andrew Jenks (born September 21, 1990) is an American goalball player born with incomplete achromatopsia. He was introduced to play goalball at a school sports day at the age of 10. ==References== Category:1990 births Category:Sportspeople from Wilmington, Delaware Category:Medalists at the 2016 Summer Paralympics Category:Living people Category:Paralympic silver medalists for the United States Category:Goalball players at the 2016 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic goalball players of the United States Category:Male goalball players Category:Paralympic medalists in goalball
title: Andy Jenks
